fields.name: Facelift (Day):
fields.value: Choose what ~~class~~ role your body will leave behind when you use your Possess night ability. Can only be used once a day.

fields.name: Mind Control (Day, 3 uses):
fields.value:
Force a player to vote and prevent target from further voting.
- Cannot force the King to vote, but can force votes against the King.

fields.name: Puppet Strings (Night):
fields.value:
Control target player and see their whispers tomorrow. Then, force them to attack a 2nd target for you.
- Controlled player will visit targets - not you

fields.name: Possess (Night, 2 uses):
fields.value:
Jump to target player's body, acquiring their logs/deathnote and healing yourself. Your old body will reveal your old logs and selected Facelift ~~class~~ *role*.
- Target is unhealable. Only consumes on success.
